import React from 'react'; import data from '../data'; function HomeScreen(props){ return
ScrollnShop
Cart Sign In

Shopping Categories

  • Pants
  • Shirts
    { data.products.map(product =>
  • {product.name}
    {product.brand}
    {product.price}
    {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews} Reviews)
    • ) }
All right reserved.
} export default HomeScreen;
